For sale:

T206 Lena Blackburne Piedmont, GAI 3, VG, $28.00

Please add $2.95 for USPS with tracking.

Payment via Paypal gift or personal check.

Thanks, Tom S.

Open to E90 to E106, T3, sporting news supplements as trade. Just ask equal value for equal value.

Otherwise heading to EBAY this weekend.

Thanks,

Tom
